recoverLostToken(address).notice: allow anyone to send lost tokens (excluding principle or Necc) to the DAO

setAdjustment(uint256,bool,uint256,uint2.notice: set adjustment info for a collector's reward rate

setContract(uint8,address).notice: sets the contract address for LP staking

setWarmup(uint256).notice: set warmup period in epoch's numbers for new stakers

toggleDepositLock(address).notice: prevent new deposits to address (protection from malicious activity)
